abstract.para:
A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: {"type":"and","predicates":[{"type":"equals","key":"TAXON_KEY","value":"2433433"},{"type":"equals","key":"SPATIAL_ISSUES","value":"false"},{"type":"equals","key":"GEOREFERENCED","value":"true"}]}
The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive:
1 records from Occurrence of mammalia relicts at site Istalloskö
